title: 2/bd 2/ba, Oversized walk-in closets, Henderson NV
posting_body: South of Las Vegas, in picturesque Henderson, The Bristol at Sunset is everything you could ever want in an apartment community.

With proximity to everything from the nature preserves to the excitement, shopping, and entertainment of nearby casinos – when you live here, your most difficult decision will be how to spend your weekends.

Private balcony or patio                                                                                        Featured amenity-Exterior storage available-Subway tile kitchen backsplash-In-home washer and dryer                                                                                        Featured amenity-Air conditioning with programmable thermostat                                                                                        Featured amenity-Wood-style plank flooring-Ceiling fans in dining room-Oversized walk-in closets-Stainless steel appliances including refrigerator and dishwasher                                                                                                                                Select units                                                                                                                                Featured amenity-Polished kitchen countertops

Fenced dog park with pet watering station-Professional onsite management-Barbecue pavilions and picnic area-Controlled-entry access-Relaxing resort-style pool with sundeck and spa                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity-Worry-free 24-hour onsite maintenance-Virtual Moving Concierge: Complimentary address change, set up home services and digital moving announcements-24-hour fitness center with free weights and cardio machines                                                                                         Featured amenity-Onsite playground-Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply)
